body.content:
Hello

I am Miss AICHA EME, My father EME DANIEL was a gold miner . My father
and mother died tragically because they were killed by colleagues and
associates working with my father because my father refused to show
them where he had deposited the sum of $US 6,000,000 dollars .

My late father used my name as his only child to deposit the fund as
the next of kin.Before his death my father had given me the necessary
documents covering the deposit of the fund. The fund is deposited in a
security company in Ivory Coast .The company do not know the real
contents of the consignment as my late father told them that the
contents is family valuables for security reasons . Also I have the
key to the trunk box containg the fund as well as the documents .

Having been able to get in touch with the company after the events
that take place here in IVORY COAST the company now arranged and send
the consignment to one of their agency in Europe for strict security
reasons.

I send this message to solicit your help so you can help me to
retrieve . I live in a refugee camp been taken care of by the
UN.Please sir do try your best to listen to my supplication as an
orphan for God will reward you back.Do get nack to me as you get this
message so that I can give you all the information and documents
concerning the consignment.I propose to offer you 15% of the total
amount and 5% for the expenses that you will incur in the recovery of
the fund.

Please consider this matter as strictly confidential .

Thanks and remain blessed.

Truly Yours,

Miss Aicha Eme

header.subject: I have been waiting for your reply.
